title: one of two things going on here.
body:
Either A. China is refusing to Talk to NA, them owning Riot are shutting down communication with their American Player base.
or B.  Riot fucked up their own game and is denying anyone to give Feedback, because it's all bad news bears from here.

replies.body: What the hell are you even talking about?
are you talking about problems with the client? because I am having a lot of problems.
